function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complex temporal role of urban density in the spread of the virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High urban density and crowding may contribute to increased transmission of contagious diseases due to close proximity and frequent interaction among people.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited funding for multidisciplinary research in robotics and infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on sustained research efforts for robotics in infectious disease management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of robotic systems for remote access may lead to reduced human interaction, impacting mental health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on teleoperation and telecommuting may lead to decreased in-person social interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards online gatherings and events may impact personal connections and community engagement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of qualified staff for swabbing and processing test samples","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to identify silent infections without symptoms","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of exposure for medical staff during blood drawing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sample transfer and delivery of medicines","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of UV light devices for surface disinfection may not reach all surfaces or provide consistent coverage, leading to incomplete disinfection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating thermal sensors and vision algorithms onto autonomous or remotely operated robots for temperature screening may lead to inaccurate or misleading results.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Networking security systems with facial recognition software to trace contacts of infected individuals may pose privacy risks and potential misuse of personal data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of frontline health care practitioners to contagious pathogens through direct patient contact.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of COVID-19 on manufacturing and socioeconomic functions, leading to increased need for remote operation and maintenance.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in existing properties","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for green retrofitting in building modifications","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) in building wellness strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Surface-to-person transmission via contact with infected surfaces or objects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission via direct contact or airborne respiratory droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of poor indoor environmental quality on health and well-being","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Downloading content from unknown sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information about the content downloaded","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to outdated content","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination during RNA extraction process","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper handling of sewage samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to properly disinfect the work area","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential presence of SARS-CoV-2 in unfiltered sewage samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 signal in PEG-precipitated filtrate fraction","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of viral signal in solid materials on the filter","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater collection samples with SARS-CoV-2 virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of the virus during sample collection and handling","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misinterpretation of wastewater data leading to premature public health actions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of estimating disease prevalence based on wastewater testing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater testing to detect population-level prevalence of SARS-CoV-2","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in viral titer estimates from wastewater could lead to inaccurate calculations of disease prevalence.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations in testing capacity and criteria for testing could lead to an underestimate of clinically confirmed cases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"A significant fraction of cases may go undetected with current testing algorithms, especially asymptomatic individuals.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete quantification of viral titers due to lack of investigation on recovery rates for each step in the process.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in PMMoV concentrations across samples without understanding the stability over time for the catchment population.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples indicating potential community spread","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data on viral shedding in stool over the clinical course of the disease","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on protocol without validation using expensive commercial kits","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential presence of viral genomes in sewage","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in viral load estimates in sewage and stool","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large variation in viral load in stool samples","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in viral signal degradation during storage at 4°C","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unstable sewage flow rate impacted by factors including rainstorms","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in PMMoV levels across samples with a standard deviation of 1.34 CT units","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"}]}
